data.system_settings: Microsoft Windows Version 1803 (OS Build 17134.376) [Microsoft Edge Specific]
data.client_settings: Microsoft Edge 42.17134.1.0 Microsoft EdgeHTML 17.17134 / [BUILD INFO] Release Channel: stable, Build Number: 27216
data.actual_result: There is a rectangular box that pops out for less than a second
data.expected_result: There is not supposed to be a rectangular box
data.short_description: There is this weird thin rectangular box when you try to log out on Discord
data.steps_to_repro: - Open up Discord on Microsoft Edge - Go to User Settings > Log Out - Press on it and you'll notice the rectangular box on the very right of the modal (inside the modal) - For more reference, please check the video that is attached below
